lead_paragraph: Double Olympic silver medallist Louis Smith has been suspended for two months by British Gymnastics over a leaked video in which he and fellow gymnast Luke Carson appeared to mock Islam.

headline.print_headline: Gymnast Smith Banned for Two Months After Offensive Video
headline.main: Gymnast Smith Banned for Two Months After Offensive Video

snippet: Double Olympic silver medallist Louis Smith has been suspended for two months by British Gymnastics over a leaked video in which he and fellow gymnast Luke Carson appeared to mock Islam....
